short_summary: To provide Dentists and Certified Dental Assistants.

full_summary:
# Tender Announcement

## Solicitation for Dental Services
### Reference Number
WS3986027009 Doc3986061775
#### Amendment Number
3
#### Solicitation Number
WS3986027009

## Key Information

- **Publication Date**: April 28, 2023
- **Tender Closing Date**: June 2, 2023, 14:00:00
- **Amendment Date**: May 29, 2023
- **Expected Contract Start Date**: August 31, 2023

## Tender Details

- **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP)
- **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
- **Selection Criteria**: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price
- **Procurement Category**: SRV (Services)

## Contract Details

- **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
- **End User Entities**: Department of Indigenous Services (ISC)
- **Regions of Delivery**: Ontario (except National Capital Region)

## Tender Description

Indigenous Services Canada (ISC) requires up to two contractors to provide dental services to First Nation and Inuit communities in Sioux Lookout. The services will be provided on an "as and when requested" basis. The contract period is 12 months from the date of contract award, with an option to extend for up to three additional 1-year periods under the same conditions.

The estimated value of the contract is not specified. The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

## Supporting Documents

- The tender notice and all associated documents are available on the Ariba discovery platform.
- Please contact the procurement representative for further information.

## Contract Representative
- Sean Webster (SPAC/PSPC)
- sean.webster@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
